description: Safety barriers need to be replaced alongside other "essential" maintenance work, the council says.
title: Overnight closures for Leicester city centre flyover
title_page: Overnight closures for Leicester city centre flyover - BBC News
maintext:
A flyover on Leicester's inner ring road will shut for five consecutive nights.
Drivers will be diverted away from Burleys Way Flyover nightly from 20:00 to 06:00 GMT from Monday 3 March to Friday.
Leicester City Council said damaged bridge safety barriers needed to be replaced as well as "essential maintenance" carried out.
A diversion will be signposted along Burleys Way and St Matthews Way.
